description: Excellent to serve as a "Meat Free Monday" meal.
name: Cold Vegetable & Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cups zucchini, very small dice - deseeded
0.5 cups fresh corn about 2 cobbettes (or can use canned if desired)
250g pasta (your choice - i used fusilli this time)

recipeInstructions.text: Gather all ingredients together. Bring a large pot of water to the boil, add salt, then Pasta. Stir and cook for 8 minutes. At the 8 minute mark, add Corn and Peas, bring back to the boil and cook for a further 3 minutes.
Whilst Pasta is cooking, start chopping and grating Vegetables. Add to a large serving bowl, along with the Garlic, Parsley and Paprika.
Once the Pasta, Peas and Corn are cooked, drained and cooled, add to serving bowl and mix to incorporate well.

TO MAKE DRESSING - into a medium bowl, add Red Wine Vinegar, Dijon Mustard and Maple Syrup, whisk together. Add EVOO to Vinegar mix in a slow and steady stream, whisking constantly until Dressing thickens slightly. Season with Salt and Pepper if desired. Have a taste test and adjust accordingly.
Pour Dressing over Salad and mix well again. Serve and enjoy or refrigerate until required.
